name: Puzzle Cube (itch)
description:
This is a game I've made with the help of DawdlePuss (Audio/Music) and NyxStarr (Art) for the Itch weekly game jam WGJ153. 

You play as a small cubic robot, wandering around your cube world looking for parts to build a shelter.

The browser version of the game will take some time to load/transition between the different sides of the cube. 

Use the arrow keys to control the cube.

If you have any bug reports, suggestions or want to contact for any other reason, send me an email at: daanniiionline @ gmail.com don't be afraid to say hi!
